short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects you to the Guardian Australia if you habitually visit The Age. Live a less advertorial life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will only redirect visits to The Age homepage.
Direct links to Age articles/"special features" will still work.
